name: Lands of Dandelion
description: When your Jean, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Dandelion Field will cause you to deal +1 Anemo DMG.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1502], who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115021]</color> will cause you to deal +1 <color=#80FFD7FF>$[K105]</color>.
